settings.text: Picture this: you're scrolling through social media, bombarded with the "perfect" face, the "it" look. You feel a pang of frustration – where do you fit in? That's where we come in, at "Freckled & Fierce". We're not about chasing trends or fitting the mold. We're about celebrating what makes you YOU.

settings.title: Breaking Free from the Beauty B.S.
settings.content:
Call it a happy accident but what started out as a small-scale solo distribution project in 2012 has evolved into a sales platform with a large retailer network and a portfolio of innovative beauty brands. Our first HQ was a car boot; now we have teams working from all over Europe.

Our goal is to give you the opportunity to find everything you want in the world of beauty and even more.

One of the most powerful online beauty retailers in Europe, MDV is already successfully operating in 36 countries. Every day we continue to work for you, expanding the horizons of MDV and creating a unique beauty world.
settings.name: Evelien Kahn, founder of MDV

settings.title: Your Makeup Playground
settings.description: Think of MDV as your makeup playground, not a beauty bootcamp. We offer quality products, ethically sourced and cruelty-free, that cater to all kinds of beautiful – from bold and bright to soft and natural. Whether you're a makeup whiz or just starting out, we've got something for you to explore and express yourself with.

settings.text: We're building a community where everyone feels welcome to share, learn, and celebrate each other's beauty, unfiltered and unapologetically real.

settings.title: Building a Community of Fierce Individuals
settings.description: We're not here to tell you what to do. We're here to support you on your journey of self-discovery, to experiment and find your own unique kind of fierce.
